reason.tex:
\begin{align} \lim_{x\to 0}\dfrac{\sin 10 x}{x\cdot (1+\cos 2x)} &= \lim_{x\to 0}\left[\dfrac{\dfrac{\sin 10x}{x}}{1+\cos 2x} \right] \\ &= \dfrac{\lim_{x\to 0}\dfrac{\sin 10x}{x}}{\lim_{x\to 0}(1+\cos 2x)} \\ &= \dfrac{10}{2} = 5 \end{align} %text
We have used the standard result \[ \qquad \lim_{x\to 0}\dfrac{\sin Mx}{Nx} = \dfrac{M}{N} \] %
